    index="retrievers_example",
    retriever={
        "pinned": {
            "docs": [
                {
                    "_id": "1"
                },
                {
                    "_id": "2"
                }
            ],
            "retriever": {
                "standard": {
                    "query": {
                        "match": {
                            "text": "elasticsearch"
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
